/usr/local/cuda/bin/nvcc -forward-unknown-to-host-compiler -g -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/CPPCU_TEST_ALL.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/CPPCU_TEST_ALL.dir/src/baseTOOL.cpp.o CMakeFiles/CPPCU_TEST_ALL.dir/src/0_CU/cu1_init.cu.o CMakeFiles/CPPCU_TEST_ALL.dir/src/0_CU/cu2_addSum.cu.o CMakeFiles/CPPCU_TEST_ALL.dir/src/0_CU/cu3_calcTime.cu.o -o CMakeFiles/CPPCU_TEST_ALL.dir/cmake_device_link.o   -L/usr/local/cuda-10.2/lib64/libcudart_static.a  -L/home/hk001/CLionProjects/CPP/CPPCU_TEST_ALL/Threads::Threads  -L/home/hk001/CLionProjects/CPP/CPPCU_TEST_ALL/dl  -L/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/librt.so  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib  -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
